reviews.review: Very good

• Overall fun and enjoyable
• Good progression system/unlocks
• Iconic horror characters from various films
• Continuous content updates and roadmap plans
• Tons of replayability

Can sometimes be infuriating at times and has its downs but overall a game that I have enjoyed for a while and would still recommend to people! If you can, at least try it out of "free to play" weekends when you can and consider buying it. It even has 50% sales quite often so your getting a game that could keep you entertained for only 10 bucks! (Not counting DLC which is $5-$7 per chapter)

Old Review (June 2021) Shit game. Used to be good now its just shit. Probably will play it again tho cuz im masochist or something. Shit game.

Being a horror movie enthusiast that wanted to try out both sides of the sequence, I picked this game up and was immediately hooked, no pun intended.

The music and sound design is some of the most immersive and tense I've heard in any horror game, especially for an asymmetrical multiplayer one. You can choose to play as killer or survivor with vastly different skills and playstyles for each killer and perk build.

Honestly, if you love horror movies and playing an infuriatingly fun game with friends, pick this game up.

Its a good game to pick up and play with a group of friends! By yourself is hard. In recent updates it's more enjoyable to play killer than survivor. Highly recommend if you have a group to play with.

EDIT: The game was good but now after playing it for so long, the game is full of trolls and toxic people. The game is broken beyond repair. The game developers do not listen to the community at all. Progression in the game takes too long. The game is a money grab. They never fix the game. They just pump out new content for players to buy and be mad about when the game breaks in the first hour of launch. The game was all fun at first, playing with friends and such, but now we say the game's name and all of us sigh and don't wanna play but know we gotta to progress. I hope they fix their stuff and make the game more enjoyable instead of it being a money grab.
